description: Before it was replaced, you could create a RBM file by clicking the tab of the menu bar you wanted to export, selecting File → Export [menu bar name]... , choosing the save location, naming the file, and clicking Save .
To import the RBM file, select File → Import , navigate to your file location, and click Import .
NOTE: REAL Software Real Studio became Xojo, Inc. Xojo in 2013.
